mapper.select: select report_id, target_id, reason, user_id, is_processed from reports order by report_id
mapper.insert: insert into reports (report_id, reason, report_content, is_processed, user_id, target_id) values (report_id_seq.nextval, #{reason}, #{reportContent}, 0, 'user', (select user_id from users where nickName = #{nickName}))
